nodes.text: Jowres Zaprin was a male Human that lived at the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was the son of Larence Zaprin and lived at the remote Zaprin Estate on Naboo with his family. His sister Mia called him Jowy.

In 1 ABY, a group of sick narglatches and motts surrounded the Zaprin's home. Jowres and his sister Mia went outside to check the situation but were attacked by the crazed animals. Both were wounded by the animals and developed a severe infection. His worried father sent an urgent call for help and soon a medic arrived at the Zaprin Estate. The medic first tried to help Mia, but the treatment didn't work. So the medic single-handedly killed several of the sick creatures that surrounded the house. From blood samples extracted from the creatures' bodies, the medic was able to create an anti-toxin. After an injection with the new medicine, Jowres and Mia recovered from the infection within a week.

Jowres Zaprin was a non-player character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies who could be found in a remote building in the Nabooian Gallo Mountains south-east of the Lake Retreat. He was part of the quest House Call for players of the Medic profession. During each server reset, Jowres Zaprin's appearance was randomized, but he consistently appeared as a male Human.
